entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:36 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -29.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -29.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -35.2°C
Wind: W 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
